participant_1.background:
My parents are always busy with work, so I spend most of my time alone.
I'm always looking for new ways to improve my photography skills, so I'd love to learn more about how to take better pictures of nature.
i have many girlfriends.
i like pizza.
I once ate ice cream in my underwear in public, but then I realized people were staring at me, so I ran away.

participant_2.background:
I'd be a terrible soldier if I were blind.
I love that my job allows me to help animals in need.
I've managed to manage my diabetes well enough to become a bartender.
i drive a ford taurus.
I am a vegetarian who is concerned about my father's health.

content.text: Hey, I'm a 22 year old male who is passionate about photography and loves to travel. I'm looking for a new friend to chat with. What about you?
Hey, my name is participant_2. I'm a 26 year old female who loves animals and working with them. I'm also a vegetarian and I'm concerned about my father's health.  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go on hikes and take pictures of nature. I also like to go out to eat with my friends. I'm really close with my parents, but they're always busy with work so I spend most of my time alone.
That sounds really nice. I wish I could go on more hikes. My job as a bartender doesn't leave me with much time for fun.
I know what you mean. My job as a photographer can be pretty demanding too. What kind of animals do you work with?
I work at a local animal shelter and I get to help out with all sorts of animals, like dogs, cats, rabbits, and even some reptiles. It's really rewarding work.
That sounds amazing. I've always wanted to work with animals. Do you ever get to take them home with you?
Sometimes, if they're really sick or if there's not enough space at the shelter. I've had a few cats and rabbits that I've taken home for a while.
That sounds really nice. I'm sure they love having you to take care of them.
I like to think so. They're always so happy to see me when I come to visit.
I'm glad you're able to find a job that you're passionate about. It sounds like you're making a real difference in the world.
